protein.specific_function: This protein is one of the nuclear-coded polypeptide chains of cytochrome c oxidase, the terminal oxidase in mitochondrial electron transport

reference.reference_text: Sadlock JE, Lightowlers RN, Capaldi RA, Schon EA: Isolation of a cDNA specifying subunit VIIb of human cytochrome c oxidase. Biochim Biophys Acta. 1993 Feb 20;1172(1-2):223-5.
